newsitem.title: USA: FOB Gulf Grain - Soy values lower, corn mixed.
newsitem.headline: FOB Gulf Grain - Soy values lower, corn mixed.

text.p: U.S. FOB Gulf soybean basis values were lower late Wednesday in reaction to declining export demand, as foreigners shift to South American supplies, dealers said.
Corn basis values were mixed and July hard red winter wheat basis offers were lower. Soft red winter wheat basis values were unchanged.

Vessel draft restrictions of 35 feet applied Wednesday in the southwest pass at the mouth of the Mississippi River should not affect grain vessel traffic. Dealers said most grain vessels operate at 35-foot drafts or less.
CORN (No. 3 yellow, FOB, U.S. Gulf, basis CBOT, cts/bu) -
-- Bid Chng Offer Chng
April unq + K nc +20 + K nc
May unq + K nc +19.5 + K up .5
June unq + N nc +21.5 + N dn .5
July unq + N nc +21.5 + N dn .5
August unq + U nc unq + U nc
Note: K=CBOT May, N=CBOT July, U=CBOT Sept, nc=no comparison.

((Chicago newsdesk 312-408-8720))
